name: aws-lambda-otel-observability
description: AWS Lambda OpenTelemetry observability demo with SNS/SQS distributed tracing

scripts.deploy-publisher: cd src/publisher && zip -r ../../publisher.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name asyncdemo-publisher-x86 --zip-file fileb://../../publisher.zip
scripts.deploy-consumer: cd src/consumer && zip -r ../../consumer.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name asyncdemo-consumer-temp --zip-file fileb://../../consumer.zip

author: Your Name
